languages.text: "Отвратительно! Покой, конец, ничего — это так... предопределенно".
"It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."
languages.original_text: "Отвратительно! Покой, конец, ничего — это так... предопределенно".

traits.locale_text: "Sickening! The peace, the end, the nothingness, it is all so... predetermined."
"Sickening! The peace, the end, the nothingness, it is all so... predetermined."
"It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."
"It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."
"It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."
"It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."

languages.text: « C'était affreux ! À la fin... il n'y avait plus que le néant. Tout semblait tellement... inévitable. »
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."

traits.locale_text: « C'était affreux ! À la fin... il n'y avait plus que le néant. Tout semblait tellement... inévitable. »

languages.text: «¡Ha sido horrible! Al final... solo quedaba el olvido. Todo parecía tan... inevitable».
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ha sido horrible! Al final... solo quedaba el olvido. Todo parecía tan... inevitable».

languages.text: “真是太可怕了！到了最后……只剩下湮灭，感觉根本是……避无可避。”
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."

traits.locale_text: “真是太可怕了！到了最后……只剩下湮灭，感觉根本是……避无可避。”

languages.text: 「最悪だ！最終的には忘却のみが残る。これは…回避不能だ」
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."

traits.locale_text: 「最悪だ！最終的には忘却のみが残る。これは…回避不能だ」

languages.text: "Es war schrecklich! Letztlich ... gab es nur das Nichts. Es fühlte sich alles so ... unvermeidlich an."
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."

traits.locale_text: "Es war schrecklich! Letztlich ... gab es nur das Nichts. Es fühlte sich alles so ... unvermeidlich an."

languages.text: "Korkunçtu! En sonunda yalnızca... Hiçlik vardı. Son derece... Kaçınılmaz hissettirdi."
languages.original_text: "It was terrible! In the end... there was only oblivion. It all felt so... inevitable."
